cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Join your fellow Kentico enthusiasts this May for a user group meetup with the Kentico User Group – Sydney, an exclusive in-person meetup designed for digital experience leaders, developers, and marketers leveraging Kentico.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Kentico User Group Sydney - May 2025 meetup

This is your opportunity to gain expert insights, hear real-world success stories, and network with industry peers over drinks and nibbles.

* **Joe Peschardt**, Client Business Director, [Devotion Digital](https://www.devotion.com.au/)
* **Tim McDermott**, Regional Sales Manager, [Kentico](https://www.kentico.com/)

It will cover the following topics.

* Why Now Is the Time to Upgrade to Xperience by Kentico
* Upgrading to Xperience by Kentico – How Easy Is It?
* Fireside Chat: Real-World Success Story
* The Future of Digital Experience with Xperience by Kentico
